Html:
I am trying to build an array of markers around a 3D cube. In each face of the cube I put a marker, and I adjust the coordinates in the ARTag configuration file to form the cube. The problem that I am having is that the Z dimension in the marker node configuration doesnt work, we tried different configurations but changing the Z didnt affect the result. I was wondering if anyone has done something like this, I dont know if we are doing something wrong or if there is a problem with ArTag.

Thanks.

Hi aaecheve,

As noted in ARTag documentation, they do not support Z coordinate for their evaluation version. Unfortunately, there is no commercial or licensed version for ARTag now, so you won't be able to find a public version that supports Z coordinate.

Thanks
